data.title: Top 40 Classic Wedding Photographers in Oneco, CT
data.meta_description: Find your perfect classic wedding photographers in Oneco, CT at Zola. We'll help you narrow down your photographer search in minutes.
data.text:
Elevate Your Wedding Experience! Our mission is to create a unique and magnificent wedding experience combined with an incredible, customer-centric product. Create your#BRememberedExperience Established in 2017, B. Remembered Productions is a wedding service company located in Massachusetts. We specialize in wedding planning, photography, entertainment, makeup, and film. We cater to the New England area and you will often find our team operating in Massachusetts, Connecticut, New Hampshire, and Rhode Island. We create and capture memorable moments that will last a lifetime.

This little hobby of mine that started back in 2015 has become an absolute dream come true!! Photographing weddings is my second favorite part of this job, with meeting the most amazing couples being the first! I knew from the start that I wanted my business to be focused on creating an amazing wedding experience that caters to each couple in a unique and memorable way! I pour myself into each couple because that's what a wedding day should be about! I also love Ninja Warrior, Starbucks, and my sweet kitty Feather!!

📸 Hi, I'm Chelsea, a wedding photographer with a love for capturing joy! With 4 years of professional experience (many more years as a hobbyist), my style mixes classic elegance with candid moments. I believe in creating a relaxed, fun environment, ensuring your special day is beautifully immortalized. Let's capture your love story! 💌

Hii! I'm Nicole and I am an Emergency Room Nurse by night and a photographer by day! I pursued my passion for photography in 2017 when I would attend my boyfriend (now fiancé's) motocross races all over New England. I quickly began capturing family and friends and learned that I loved capturing moments in life big and small! I love capturing people in love and enjoy being able to make others feel beautiful and confident through my photos.

I am a teal obsessed, chocoholic, wife & fur mama who can’t get enough of capturing love stories! Photography has been a passion project for many years but after my own 2014 wedding, I decided to parlay my years of experience in child portraiture and transition to the amazing world of wedding days! It's been 5 years and I never looked back! My goal is to not only capture bright, bold, natural images but truly share in your love story!

My husband Andrew and I know that we are our best and most authentic selves when we’re supported and intentional with our time and each other - especially since the arrival of our daughter. Marriage teaches you a lot of things, and I truly believe that my marriage has taught me how to be a better friend, communicator, and business owner. I get excited about connecting with people, building friendships with my couples, and sharing their stories through imagery.

Maybe you've been together for a decade and finally decided to make this official - hey no judgement there...I did the same thing. Perhaps you're creating blended family - I'll make sure everyone feels important without any awkward forced closeness. Or possibly you're worried that your purple hair and tattoos may be too extreme to have fancy wedding photos (hint, I LOVE that shit). Whether it's just the two of you eloping, or you've decided on a guest list of your favorite friends and family, you know that the most important thing is the LOVE you share, and not how you share it. Get married. Be loved.

Sebastian Photography is a dynamic husband and wife team, specializing in wedding and lifestyle photography. Their artistic approach fuses elements of fashion, color, composition and style. They believe that what makes a great photographer is not just the ability to operate a camera, but rather the ability to anticipate life as it unfolds. To see light and shadow as they change, and the ability to capture authentic moments that evoke emotion, and tell your story.

Hey! I'm a photographer, videographer and drone pilot born and raised in NJ. Always driven by art as a passion, I turned my passion into a career, I shoot a little bit of everything but specialize in private events such as weddings, engagements, sweet 16's, and nightlife. When I'm not looking through a lens, you'll find me somewhere outdoors, on a beach or on a mountain. Looking forward to not only working with you, but building a relationship to make capturing your event as relaxing and stress free as possible. I can't wait to start creating and planning your special event with you !

For as long as she can remember she has been behind the camera. Be it making documentaries where she grew up or telling stories one picture at a time. As someone who cherishes family, friends, and life Megan knows the importance of capturing those sweet moments together; whether it be weddings or the joys that each season of life brings. The magic that happens when you tell a story through the lens of a camera is something that lasts forever. The joy she gets from working with people is exactly why she loves what she does.

We are team of a highly experienced photographers & videographer. With 11 years in the industry, we have developed a keen eye for capturing stunning images that tell a story and evoke emotion. Our work has been featured in numerous prestigious publications, including Bazaar, Grazia, and Daily Front Row. We are known for my ability to create visually stunning images that showcase my clients in the best possible light. Contact us today to get quote. 📸

Kristen's Captures is a wedding and portrait photography company based in Coventry, RI. From your first consultation to your last pose, I will ensure that you have everything you need to look and feel your best in front of the camera. After getting my first camera from my mother, I immediately fell in love with the art of photography. Throughout my career, I have worked with an array of clients for all sorts of milestone moments. I know that each client is different, and am ready to document your candid, unscripted moments in a way that matches your style and aesthetic.

HEY! I'M ASHLEY! Aka, Your Professional third wheel! I am so happy you dropped by! I am a uber bubbly, warm hearted, person who loves to order 3 drinks at Dutch Bros and say its for other people but really its just for me. When I am not spending my lifes savings at Dutch Bros, I am professionally following peeps in love and photographing their stories. I am a lover of true crime and murder podcasts! (But I mean who isnt! I just cant help it!) FUN FACT: I speak switzerdütsch, aka a German slang. My mom is originally from Switzerland and my dad from Jamaica, so you know I am always hungry for adventures (and new places to binge eat at).

Hi there! I'm Jerilyn, a wedding photographer with a love for capturing the timeless essence of your special day. My style is classic and elegant, focusing on creating images that are not just photos, but heirlooms to be treasured for a lifetime. With a relaxed approach and a keen eye for detail, I aim to provide a stress-free wedding day photography experience.

Bonie Weddings is a wedding photography and videography company, dedicated to capturing those unscripted and genuine moments. From candid laughs and unplanned dance moves to even the cake mishaps (yes, it happens), We're there to preserve the authenticity and genuinely of your special day. Our team of professionals firmly believes that every couple should have the opportunity to capture the memories of their special day without breaking the bank.

I am a mom, a wife, a daughter, a sister, a photographer, and an artist. I feel all of these components help to to capture the emotional moments in a photo that can last a lifetime. I love what I do & do what I love. I am based out of white haven but can travel a few hours in any direction.

We’re creators, travelers, and artists, but foremost: storytellers. Every wedding is a personal project for us, with unique couples, love stories, families and locations. We strive to tell that story through our lens, and create a one-of-a-kind piece of artwork you can enjoy for a lifetime.

Your wedding photos are about 150 years of legacy, not 15 minutes of internet fame. That's where we come in. We're a husband and wife photo team devoted to making pictures that feel like YOU. These are the images that will go down in (your) history. Serving couples in Connecticut and New York.

Hi, I’m Bridget — but you can call me Bee, cause that’s what my friends call me! And since we’re basically already best friends, let me tell you a secret: taking pictures isn’t even the thing I love most about my job. Now, don’t get me wrong, I’m as obsessed with taking gorgeous, dripping-in-light photos that you’ll look back on for ages as much as the next photographer. But what I really love? Meeting the most kind-hearted people and getting to know them on a level much deeper than the typical client-photographer relationship.

I am a luxury destination photographer based in Michigan, Florida & Colorado! I am ALL over Michigan and all over the nation! I have a home in Lansing and Holland and I travel all over Michigan capturing my clients from Lansing to Grand Rapids to the west coast of Lake Michigan to northern Michigan, Mackinac Island and Traverse City to areas of Detroit! I also have condo access in Clearwater, FL and Breckenridge, CO. This allows me to be local to multiple places and states! This career is so much more than just showing up and taking photos. It's emotion, it's detail, it's getting to know my clients and capturing each of them uniquely.

Hello, I'm Margaret. It's so nice to have you. I love to see love & take pictures. Perfect match to be an engagement and wedding photographer. I'm a lover of fine art and candid moments. My editing style is filled with true color photography to bring your photos to life.

My name is George. I am a Wedding, Event and Portrait photographer based in Connecticut. I began my photography journey at the age of 17. In 2009 I went to the Fashion Institute of Technology (Manhattan, NY) and graduated in Fashion Photography class. My desire as an artist is to create natural pictures that are full of life and express beauty. With my European heritage and unique style, I create your every need differently and diligently, capturing all the emotions and unique details of your photography requests.

These moments on your forever day are to be cherished in time, my goal is to capture all of these moments timelessly with you by my side in awe! I’m very excited to start our adventure together. Your unique style. What makes you come alive. What you hope to share with the world. That's what you want in your wedding photos.

Hi! My name is Courtney. I am the owner and lead shooter of Courtney Cohen Photography. I am based out of Barrington, RI, and love to spend time with my husband, toddler, and dog by the beaches of Rhode Island. I have a very candid approach when it comes to photography. I want to capture the raw emotion that you will remember for years and years to come. I shoot mainly outdoors with natural light but am trained with OCF (off-camera flash) for any low light or indoor locations. I strive to work with my clients not only to give them amazing pictures but also to make their lives as easy as possible. I hope that you reach out and we can chat!

Situated out of Providence, Rhode Island, R&I Photography is a wedding photography company. Owners, Rebecca and Ilia specialize in providing candid, natural, and artistic photography while helping couples to relax and have fun in front of the camera. Every couple's love is unique and wonderful, and this team wants to give them a collection and an experience they'll remember and cherish forever.

Welcome to our page! We are published award-wining photographers. Best friends and have an amazing team of talented photographers and videographers that work with us. Our style is a blend of elegance, journalistic, emotional, candid, fashion and portrait photography. We want to make sure you have most incredible memories for many years to come. We want you to feel comfortable in front of the lens and have fun taking photos.

The Adirondacks is my home. I provide a business that specializes in the capture and curation of precious wedding photo galleries. I am an easy-going individual who is head-over-heels about love and all-things nuptial. I strive to create a relaxed working environment where my clients feel comfortable in front of the camera.

SERGE PROMISE CONCEPT is a Wedding Photo & Video studio that specializes in capturing and telling incredible love stories in cinematic way, with certified Photographers and Cinematographers to capture your big events. Our goal is to capture those beautiful moments and put endless smiles on our couples faces, Serge Promise Concept is happy to service your wedding ceremony and reception, starting with the pre-preparation capturing all the little toast and speeches in a beautifully blends documentary 4k style with the art of storytelling that results in incredible films.

Hi, it's Jenni, I am a couples and wedding photographer based in Connecticut. I love hikes and adventures, nature is my natural habitat and my biggest dream is to travel the world. I am hopeless romantic and I will probably shed a tear at every wedding I attend or photograph, so if you see me wipe a tear at your wedding no you didn't lol. I am also a dog mom and I love animals in general, my puppy means the world to me! I am a dedicated, passionate, fun and caring person and I put love in everything I do. I can't wait to work with you!

Growing up in Egypt, near the great Pyramids, has inspired my eyes to capture great moments that last for life time. I am surrounded both by natural beauty and interesting people. I use my camera to document the world and then print images with a focus on the magic I find in daily life. My pictures tell my stories

My name is Stephanie and I am a Photographer that leads with intention. You can find me following you around on your wedding day crying at how beautiful you are and getting giddy as we get the shot. I am dying to do the HOTTOGO dance with one of my couples on the dance floor. Fireside Sparrow leaned into weddings in 2020, so you can trust me, I've been through it, seen it, and promise you that I have GOT YOU on your wedding day.

We provide timeless, true-to-color wedding photography that will tell the story of one of the happiest days of your life! If you need your photographer to be in two places at the same time, and you want more candid shots and more angles covered, WE ARE YOUR TEAM!

Since 2016, I have been dedicated to capturing the essence of special moments with a unique blend of artistry and professionalism. I specialize in a wide range of events, from dance festivals and performances to intimate private gatherings, corporate events, and galas. My photography style is timeless, classic, and bright, capturing the genuine emotions and vibe of each event. I blend staged and candid images to tell a complete and compelling story and guarantee the best quality possible.

Two Upper West Siders. Twenty blocks apart. How had we not crossed paths before? Or did we? Well, after finally matching on Hinge we made that happen and the rest is history! We have combined families and now as a family of 7 (three dogs, two cats) we have become an unstoppable force. We both share the same passion for photography, capturing the beauty all around us and making magic happen. Our dog Lucy, embodies love, kindness and poise. We couldn’t imagine naming our business after anyone but her. That’s how Love, Lucy Photography came to be.

Hi I'm Corey In a well tailored suit and a scotch in hand is how you may find me; enjoying a good read, it's the makings of a wanderlust at heart. My true pastime is in the small imprints we make in the world around us; our connections with the people we love. Being a photographer reminds me of a simple truth, these imprints in time these echoes and moments, this is living! Your Love Story is nothing short of Amazing. Let's not miss a thing!

As a passionate Stamford photographer, I specialize in capturing your unique story with an expert eye for detail and artful precision. From weddings and engagements to intimate family gatherings, I transform moments into timeless images that convey emotions and narratives. Your photos reflect your personality, connections, and the atmosphere of the moment. My commitment to excellence ensures that every shot aligns with your vision and preferences.

Based in Granby, Massachusetts, I'm a wedding and portrait photographer that services MA and select parts of New England. I shoot in a modern and timeless style that features creative angles and clean edits. My shooting style celebrates your day in its most authentic form with a flexible balance of candid and posed coverage.

Hi there, I'm Ashely! I'm a professional photographer who loves capturing every moment & every little detail. Photos are something so special...they freeze precious moments in time & create memories which can be cherished forever. I have photographed many weddings alone, as well as been a 2nd shooter on a few occasions. I will be your personal hype woman, make sure everything looks picture perfect, and I help guide you with any posing as needed. I also love candid photos! I will make sure taking your photos is fun and "painless" as many people have said. Besides having a great experience, your pictures will last a lifetime!

Hi. I'm Sylwia, wedding photographer based in Connecticut. I believe that there is beauty to be found in everyone and everything. Each wedding is full of its own special moments and my aim is to create beautiful and intimate imagery that you can treasure forever. My work is inspired by natural light, nature, thoughtful details and people who are deeply in love.

Hi there! I'm Ashley! I'm a go with the flow, free-spirited human so I find connecting with my clients rather easily. I'm not your average photographer ..... I do things a little differently, but that's what makes the photoshoots with me so unique and special. I like to capture the in-between moments, the heart-pounding, can't live without your love moments. I am here to be your biggest hype woman and professional third wheel! I focus on preserving the raw emotion and intimate moments rather than creating extremely posed and formal shots.

At Life Through a Shutter Photography, our goal is to preserve memories and emotions that will last a lifetime. We approach our work with empathy, care and attention to detail, ensuring that each client has a personal and enjoyable experience. Sure, looks are important... I dig deeper than just what appears on the outside, I find those raw emotions and capture the connection in real time. What matters most when you look back at an image is being able to relive that emotion, what you felt in that exact moment, and hang on to that feeling. That's the real reason why photos last a lifetime and say a million words. Emotion!

I am based out of Connecticut + New England but also travel for destination weddings. I am passionate about creating long lasting memories with my clients. I love to travel (15+ countries and counting!), discover new places and meet new people. Fun fact: I'm a french citizen that moved to the United States in 2016.

I'm a photographer,entrepreneur, and an artist. I believe in discoveringyour passions and pursuing them. I love coffee, fitness, and value the simple moments in life. Just give me a cup of coffee and a movie night, and I'm happy. Let's connect! Please message me through my website, and not on Zola. Zola requires vendors to pay money to respond to your messages.

Taylor O'Connor is committed to creating an experience that brings joy, guidance, and value to your life. The amazing truth behind our mission is that you have everything you need to cultivate a beautiful life and successful mission, you are the hero of your own story-let me be your guide.

Jason "Snorlax" Cun is an all around photographer that currently resides in Los Angeles, California. He was raised in the heart of Los Angeles, where he found his calling in photography. He aims to capture the beauty of the world and the people in them. He has recently begun his travels around the U.S capturing the life of those within that city.

We're a husband and wife team, wanting to capture your beautiful memories. Photographs are the visual representation of your love story that replace memories over time. And we cherish the opportunity to help you preserve it. We have fully integrated services available including photo, video, photo booth, assistance with planning and timeline development, etc.

Krystina Pare Photography strives to make the most memories out of your wedding date. With competitive and custom packages we can fit ANY budget. Krystina Pare Photography was founded in 2019 and has continued to grow and thrive since then. Please reach out with any questions on pricing to see what we can work out.

Based out of Warwick, RI, Hitch Studios is a Wedding and Lifestyle photography business here to turn your beautiful moments into timeless memories! From your engagement session, to your wedding day, and all of your major life events after that, we can capture that magic! Stephanie was introduced to the exciting industry of weddings while working as a second shooter and instantly fell in love with the art of capturing two love birds on their special day! Since then, the goal has been to make you feel comfortable and at ease throughout the crazy process called wedding planning.

Hi. I’m Angelica and I’m here to catch your most authentic moments through my lens when you finally take the leap! My specialties are elopements and intimate weddings, I focus on candid, wholehearted moments, while always keeping the vibe playful and light. I’m a Brooklyn native, a momma, and a Harry Potter nerd who has been into art since birth. I believe weddings are a unique and precious celebration of love, and I am committed to creating timeless images that will make you feel the special moments all over again—all the happy, emotional, romantic and quirky moments that make you and your partner who you are.

Hello there!! I'm here to give you a meaningful, stress-free, and authentic experience while capturing your love in a unique way. I want to help you throughout your entire planning process. Together, let's document your memories and create beautiful images. My hope is that your photos leave you with effortless memories. I'm based in Texas but I travel all over the world. I am a creative photographer with 5 years of shooting experience. I also just recently learned videography! I've enjoyed photography my whole life but never knew how amazing it was to actually be behind the lens and bring my vision to life.

My business just started in 2023 when I found my passion for photography! I love capturing couples special moments and creating images that will last a lifetime. Meeting wonderful couples and their families holds a special place in my heart. I am a part time math tutor and a part time photographer and each of my jobs are so fulfilling in different ways and I love it.

I am small time lifestyle photographer with a lot to offer you. I have had a love for photography for as long as I can remember. I am open to any type style or theme your wedding is. I want to make sure that you are as comfortable with me as I could possibly make you, I know being on the other side of the camera is awkward but we’ll work together so it’s not!

Hello, I'm Brittany! I am the owner and main face behind Brittany Adams Photography. I am a full time lifestyle wedding photographer based out of a gorgeous, quaint costal town in RI-Bristol! I started this little business full time in 2013 and have met some pretty amazing people along this journey. All my second shooters have been trained by me, work with me consistently, and are devoted to providing the same level of attention to detail and direction on your wedding day as I am. I photograph weddings all over New England, the islands, and anywhere else your journey takes me!

Hi! I am so happy you found your way here! My name is Kristine & I am a New England Based Photographer! There is nothing I love more than being there to help you tell your love story. As a wedding photographer the most important part of my job is being sure to capture those REAL moments. I can’t wait to chat! For the quickest response please feel free to reach out to me via my website or on my Instagram- KristineMaryPhotography

At East Shore Wedding Photography, we are dedicated to capturing your wedding day with a relaxed, unobtrusive approach. We like to keep the focus on you and your guests! Using the latest technology and artistic techniques such as natural lighting, studio lighting, and off-camera flash, we deliver ultra-sharp, dramatically composed, timeless photos of your unique day. We offer an easy-going, guided experience and a dedicated team of photographers and videographers who are committed to capturing your personal story!

A New York City based photographer that documents your story as natural, organic and authentic as much as possible, whether it's a high touch wedding, a simple elegant affair, an engagement in the Tri-State area, or a portrait that shows your true self. Angelica Criscuolo Photography travels across the USA and has captured weddings and portraits in Hawaii, Barbados/Caribbean, the Philippines, and Canada. As a Creative Director, she is passionate about telling your love story, and the genuine emotions and in-between moments because photographs are what’s left to remind you of how you will feel on your special day surrounded by loved ones.

When I first started wedding photography, I made a goal of being more than just the photographer on your big day. I made it my goal to be your friend, someone you can crack inside jokes with, and someone who isn't afraid to get down + have fun at the reception (while still doing her job). I made it my goal to capture more than just photos, but an experience. Whether it’s high in the mountains, on a beach near the ocean, in a forest meadow - you deserve to get married however you want to & I want to capture it for you.

My name is Jonathan Henderson, Photography became a passion of mine while being involved in the school news paper at my high school. Holding a camera in my hands and seeing the smiles and enthusiastic gestures of my clients made my job worth while. Elegant Production Photography job is to get you to smile, set aside worry and enjoy what is happening right now in this moment. To feel comfortable about you and your choices. My goal is to produce at my very best, I aim to please from start to finish your wants and needs on your special day. It's here that I say thank you for being who you are and for choosing Elegant Production Photography.

Angela is a Destination wedding photographer capturing timeless memories. She loves providing couples with candid images that they can look back on for a lifetime. Her passion is to connect and tell couples’ love stories through the beauty and emotion of the moments captured.

I reside in Jersey City, New Jersey, serving New Jersey, New York, Connecticut, Pennsylvania, and beyond. I grew up surrounded by family photos. My parents had a professional photography business, Infinity Photography, back in the days of film. My friend asked me to do her senior portraits, so I started my photography business after my parent's business was closed for nearly 20 years. Fun fact, I chose "Grey" because I'm a nerd, and I love Jean Grey - she's my fave X-men. Also, my name is hard to spell, especially when you hear it. It's like "Leah" with a "Tuh."

Hey there! My name is Emma, a wedding, portrait, and equine photographer, originally from Northeast Connecticut, now living in central Rhode Island. Throughout my variety of experiences in life, I have had the privilege to realize the power of communication and the importance of surrounding yourself with the things that make you most happy. I hope that I can use my photographic skill to help capture your personal connections, love story, and memories through images that will last a lifetime. I am always a friendly face, please feel free to reach out at any time!

As professional Wedding Photographer & Videographer team based in the lakes region of New Hampshire, We love to be creative with our photographs as well as video and welcome your input to make your wedding day memories something you will cherish forever! Centrally located in Barnstead, we have documented Weddings all over New Hampshire, Vermont, Maine, Massachusetts, Connecticut & New York. We are also a destination wedding team and love to travel!

Light and bright, timeless photographs and videos for weddings and couples. ND, New England & CA based, available for travel. I describe myself as kind of Type A, kind of Type B. When it comes to photographing your wedding, I take a mixed approach of being a "fly on the wall" and guiding when appropriate. Lots of times my couples see their galleries and noticed things they had no clue even happened during the day. Candids and true documentary style photographs are what I strive to provide, as well as traditional photographs and poses.

Hello hello! My name is Marie and I am the owner and photographer for Wild Elegance. We are a brand for adventurers, for lovers of life, and genuine people who love those little moments between the moments in life and seek out truth over perfection. Your marriage is unique because of the relationships you have with the people you choose to celebrate with. Spending my day with you and your closest family and friends brings me such joy, and creating art out of some of the best moments of your life is something I am truly honored to be a part of for so many.

This is your special day. A wedding is a joyous occasion, for which you would like to record your memories for a lifetime. It should be stress free and this is where I can help. I would like to capture your special moments in photographs that you can view for years to come. You have put so much time into the small details as well as the big moment, now relax and enjoy the party. Just tell me your hopes and dreams and I will dedicate every minute that I am with you to photographing every detail that you wish as you request.

I am the one behind the camera. The one guiding you every step of the way, and giving you direction, but mostly I’m there to capture your love and to tell your story. Essentially it’s all about you… your style, your vision. It’s the in-betweens, the messy, the real, the bursts of laughter, the tears… that’s the stuff that I have a true love for. Photography is genuinely my passion. My goal is to tell your love story and get to know you and document your special day.

We are honored to have been selected as Best of RI for the past 6 years in a row AND just got BEST OF RI for 2021/2022! We are award-winning, nationally-published photographers, who capture dream couples making you look and feel fabulous (while having fun, of course)! If you're a fun-loving couple/family, looking for stunning images captured by an experienced, photographer who feels more like a trusted friend, then you've come to the right place. We will create a stress free environment just for you! We have a FREE "How to Pose to Look Perfect" PDF guide that you can download at our website www.SaraZarrella.com

My name is Debbie, but you can call me Ninja (you’ll understand more once we get on the phone. Haha!). I am an Intimate Wedding + Lifestyle Portrait Photographer who happens to also be a romantic at heart. My work has been featured on Brides Magazine, Insider, NBC News, Vanity Fair, Teen Vogue, The Cut, Refinery29, BuzzFeed, Huffington Post, DapperQ, to name a few. Please visit my site and send your inquiry there.

Since 2012, I have been creating authentic, organic images full of life and natural beauty. My passion is to capture the laughter, embraces, tears, and little moments occurring throughout your wedding day - I strive to create photographs that reflect the beauty that exists in the world around us, and provide something that each family would be proud to pass down from generation to generation.

My name is Nicole, I've been doing wedding and portrait photography for 9 years. In 2020, my husband Ben and I got married and now work together doing Wedding Photo/Video. He's been such a blessing, we work together so well. We love to capture not only those big moments but the smaller special things. All those little moments that will last a lifetime.

Hey Friends, Welcome to The Toasted Brew! A most unique company based in Portland, ME with a passion for telling Love Stories through photos. My name is Robert, Chief Visionary Officer & Lead Photographer of The Toasted Brew; I started in the wedding industry in 2006 as a DJ, later would add Wedding Photography and at the time of writing this I have been a part of well over 150 weddings.

We know you're probably feeling some pressure to select a wonderful photographer to document your wedding since your photographs are the only part of your wedding that are remaining once the wedding day itself is over. Selecting the photographer for you is fairly easy… you should feel a connection straight away after reviewing our portfolio, and know that we’ll capture the both of you, your wedding, your family and friends in a wonderful truthful and beautiful way that will last forever. Sometimes, it’s as simple as that…feeling it!

Growing up near cameras, flashes and lenses, my father was a photographer for a newspaper, and I loved developing photos with him in his darkroom. For the last few years, I have launched CC Garvie Photography and could not be happier--I love it ! Every new project is another exciting adventure, as I continue to develop my vision. I love capturing those precious moments, so we can look back one day and say, "wow look at that, remember when we took that photo?" That is photography to me, "preservation". And once you look back at those memories--the warm and fuzzy feelings we get in our hearts--it is priceless. Let me do that for you.

As a wedding photographer, I blend classic, traditional style with the more modern take of photojournalism. This means that while I’ll capture moments as they naturally unfold, I’ll also create a series of kick-ass portraits of the two of you & your families. I want you to swoon when you see your wedding photos - swoon, laugh, gasp & maybe even cry! Your wedding day is a celebration of YOU, and of your beautiful, quirky, funny relationship. I capture the essence of who you are, both as individuals and as a couple, through the eyes of the loved ones surrounding you.

Hi! My name is Penny Souza and I am wedding and portrait photographer. I was born and raised in beautiful Newport, RI and now live in Westerly, RI. With over 20 years of experience and an undying passion for my work, I come highly recommended and prepared to photograph all of life’s happiest occasions. My focus is on capturing candid, authentic moments that you’ll be able to cherish forever. I support couples beginning to end and provide them with everything they need before, during, and after their session.

Almost 20 years of experience and I still get as excited as I did when I first started photographing events! I got my BFA in photojournalism at Rochester Institute of Technology and my common sense from a well-lived, full life. From intimate weekday elopements to full scale destination events that require a team of photographers, I have done it all. I focus on telling the most full and vibrant story of your event, so you can look back and feel like you didn't missed a thing.

In addition to Wedding Photography, I'm a contract photographer for ZUMA Press and Everett Collection. I've been published in numerous publications and was a winner in PDN Magazine’s Ultimate Music Photo Contest – “Performance.” I have the experience and the passion that enables me to get the best photos. I try to capture the perfect moments of the wedding.

Hello and thanks for stopping by! My professional career as a Connecticut wedding photographer started nearly 20 years ago after attending photography school in Vancouver. I returned home to Milford, CT in 2000, started the business, and have been capturing wedding stories ever since!

Brian Delia Photography was started in 2009 with just 12 weddings, in a very small apartment office. In just 11 years the company has grown to over 300 Weddings & Events each year with several industry awards for excellence. From 2012, the company has won the prestigious "Couples Choice Award" which recognizes the top 5% of wedding vendors nationwide and the couple was also one of the top nominees for the Most Accomplished Award in 2016 and consistently earns the yearly "Best of Weddings" & "Hall of Fame" awards on two of the most popular wedding sites.

Skyride Productions is the filmmaking duo of my wife Becki and me (Matt). We're both nostalgic at heart with our family being the center of our universe. We love to meet new couples and tell their unique love story thru the cinematic lens.

Hi! We are Vincent + Micky, a husband and wife team with 30+ years of professional experience in fine art, design, film + photography. Our easy-going personalities and personable approach will make it easy for you to feel natural in front of the camera. Using a photojournalistic candid style of photography, we will capture the laughter, joy, tears and unique moments throughout your special day with spontaneity and clarity. Will travel to NY, CT, MA, VT, ME and RI. Based out of Sherman, Connecticut

Ever since I can remember, I've been captivated by the power of a single moment to tell a whole story. As a wedding photographer, I get to capture those fleeting, special moments that make each couple's love story unique. With over 4 + years of experience, I blend artistry with technical skill to create images that are not only beautiful but deeply meaningful.

Photographing weddings has been my joy for the last 10 years and as our couples needs and wants have evolved, we have evolved to meet those needs. Whether you are planning a full blown wedding, a smaller intimate wedding or a quiet elopement you'll find our style is contemporary with an emphasis on creative, editorial story telling photo's that will retain a timeless quality that you will love 50 years from now.

My name is Danny Fung. I am a freelance photographer on Long island. I have been passionate about photography since I was young, and finally decided to become a professional photographer in 2010. I aspire to immortalize the most meaningful parts of your life through my pictures so you can cherish them forever. As your photographer, the objective of my work is always to capture the uniqueness of the moment.

At Ja'de Imagery the focus will always be on creating the magic of your story and forever moment. Being intentional from your yes to your I do and a little of everything in between. I am here to help you capture it all. My goal for your images are to be natural with the sense of deep emotion, character evoking, and finding the best way to showcase your chemistry and personality.

Currently living in my hometown of Bristol, Connecticut, I have been a teacher of Social Studies and Psychology for my entire career - only recently having retired. The majority years of my educational career (20) were spent as a teacher in U.S. Embassy / Consulate / and international schools - six countries in all. In my situation, the saying, "It's been a trip" has literally been the case. But wait, there's more! Since I've been 12 years old, I have also been a serious photographer. Talk about the best of two worlds.

Erika Rene couples value connection, relationship, legacy, and covenant. For me, photography has never been about snapping a few shots; its about immortalizing the profound moments and all of the ones in between that make up the best day of your lives so far, ensuring that your love story will live far beyond the here and now and will be cherished by multiple generations to come. I know how important it is to you to work with someone who feels more like a friend than a vendor, and that's why all of my couples truly become family to me!

I am a New England raised, New York sports loving, family first type of woman... I love coffee and traveling alone ... I’m always down for a plane ride or a car ride with windows down while blasting some old school hip hop..

There is no better feeling than a client saying, "You captured moments I didn't even realize I was having." I also love to set the stage to tell a story, highlight the beautiful details of the day, and utilize the light and space to capture breathtaking images. The finished product is a wonderful reminder of one of the best days of their lives and a collection of memories that couples can enjoy for many years to come.
